response.explain: The previous action code has successfully moved the robot to the oven without any errors. The next step is to open the oven to access the french toast inside.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the oven.
(2) Open the oven.
(3) Grasp the french toast from the oven.
(4) Move the robot to the breakfast table.
(5) Put the french toast on the plate.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):

    open(robot, oven)
